__comment: You should only copy those values that are empty or those
that you explicitly want to modify.

database.__comment: States user can have in database. No need to change this.

bot.__comment: 0 for production, 1 to print debugging information,
2 to disable error catching and safety mechanisms
IDs for bot admin and main guild
If you have too much subjects, that they exceed the 500 channel limit,
you can set up second server. The bot will deal with role sync.
How is the bot hosted? This is needed in some Admin cog commands.
Supported options: standalone, docker, systemd, systemd+docker

channels.__comment: Channel for voice commands & chat with people without mic

__comment: Colors for embeds. They are standard hex RGB values in base 10
Timers for automatic deletion of bot's messages

roles.__comment: Which roles are considered fully local
Which roles are considered as visiting

reaction cog.__comment: Some channels are dedicated to the react-to-role

karma cog.__comment: IDs for roles that shouldn't have karma
IDs for channels that shouldn't have karma effects

voice cog.__comment: Wordlist for automatic voice channel name generation

warden cog.__comment: Where the images should be checked for duplicities. (memes etc)

compatibility.__comment: Do not send the same emote as other bot here
